oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Church Street from Fifth Avenue by Night, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1910s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color postcard of Church Street as pictured from 5th Avenue, in downtown Nashville, circa the 1910s. The Watkins Institute is pictured, with its central tower in the background. Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wills, Ridley, 1934-
Watkins Institute (Nashville, Tenn.)
